channel.title: How to hide your account in Windows
channel.description:
go to Start>>Run>>Regedit and go to: HKLM/Software/Mcft/windows NT/Currentversion/winlogon/specialaccounts/userlist
and add a new DWORD value of [Username].
Enjoy.

item.title: How to hide your account in Windows
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Home:

Lol… Leader my “ways” doesn’t work :O??

Bro the computer password way doesn’t work.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 23, 2006, 05:58:45 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Taylor, post:6, topic:10681”][quote author=leader link=topic=15670.msg178397#msg178397 date=1156353745]
That would be good. But first we have to find out how to make yourself an admin at school. The ways over here don’t seem to work for me.
[/quote]i know how, I’m just not telling the other way around, its in administrator tools in control panel, figure out the rest yourself :)[/quote]

You know…I bet. hehe

Read full topic

item.title: How to hide your account in Windows
item.dc:creator: @Chase Chase
item.description:
@Chase wrote:

go to Start>>Run>>Regedit
and go to:
HKLM/Software/Mcft/windows
NT/Currentversion/winlogon/specialaccounts/userlist

and add a new DWORD value of [Username].

Enjoy.

Read full topic
